trans-unit.source: Creates typed versions of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> for more efficient serialization.
trans-unit.target: 會建立具型別的的版本<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>更有效率的序列化。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns a derivation of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"></xref> class that is used to serialize the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回衍生<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"></xref>類別，用來序列化指定型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to serialize.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>序列化。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class that is specifically created to serialize the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 衍生<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>序列化指定型別特別建立的類別。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Returns a derivation of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"></xref> class using an object that maps one type to another.
trans-unit.target: 傳回衍生<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"></xref>類別對應到另一種類型的物件使用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> that maps one type to another.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>對應至另一種類型。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>

trans-unit.source: A derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class that is specifically created to serialize the mapped type.
trans-unit.target: 衍生<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>序列化對應的型別特別建立的類別。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Returns a derivation of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"></xref> class that is used to serialize the specified type and namespace.
trans-unit.target: 傳回衍生<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"></xref>用來序列化指定型別和命名空間的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to serialize.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>序列化。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The default namespace to use for all the XML elements.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用之 XML 項目的預設命名空間。

trans-unit.source: A derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class that is specifically created to serialize the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 衍生<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>序列化指定型別特別建立的類別。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Returns a derivation of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"></xref> class that is used to serialize the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回衍生<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"></xref>類別，用來序列化指定型別。

trans-unit.source: If a property or field returns an array, the extraTypes parameter specifies objects that can be inserted into the array.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性或欄位傳回陣列， extraTypes 參數會指定可以插入到陣列的物件。

trans-unit.source: Calling this overload is similar to calling the [XmlSerializer(Type, Type\[\])](assetId:///M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor(System.Type,System.Type[])?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False) to create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個多載是類似於呼叫[XmlSerializer (Type，Type\[\])](assetId:///M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor(System.Type,System.Type[])?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False)來建立執行個體的<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>類別。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to serialize.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>序列化。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> array of additional object types to serialize.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>要序列化的其他物件類型的陣列。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>所衍生

trans-unit.source: Returns a derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class that can serialize objects of the specified type into XML documents, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 傳回衍生<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>類別可以序列化成 XML 文件，指定型別的物件，反之亦然。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Each object to be serialized can itself contain instances of classes, which this overload can override with other classes.
trans-unit.target: 每個要序列化的物件本身可包含類別，這個多載可以覆寫與其他類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Calling this overload is similar to calling the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%28System.Type%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides%29> to create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個多載是類別的類似於呼叫<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%28System.Type%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides%29>來建立執行個體<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>類別。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%28System.Type%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to serialize.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>序列化。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> that contains fields that override the default serialization behavior.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>，其中包含覆寫預設序列化行為的欄位。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: A derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>所衍生

trans-unit.source: Returns a derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class that can serialize objects of the specified type into XML documents, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 傳回衍生<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>類別可以序列化成 XML 文件，指定型別的物件，反之亦然。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the object that represents the XML root element.
trans-unit.target: 指定的物件，代表 XML 根項目。

trans-unit.source: Calling this overload is similar to calling the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%28System.Type%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute%29?displayProperty=fullName> to create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個多載是類別的類似於呼叫<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%28System.Type%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute%29?displayProperty=fullName>來建立執行個體<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>類別。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%28System.Type%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to serialize.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>序列化。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> that represents the XML root element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute>代表 XML 根項目。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>所衍生

trans-unit.source: Returns a derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class that can serialize objects of the specified type into XML document instances, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 傳回衍生<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>類別可以序列化為 XML 文件執行個體，指定型別的物件，反之亦然。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Each object to be serialized can itself contain instances of classes, which this overload can override with other classes.
trans-unit.target: 每個要序列化的物件本身可包含類別，這個多載可以覆寫與其他類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This overload also specifies the default namespace for all the XML elements, and the class to use as the XML root element.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載也會指定所有的 XML 項目，以及要做為 XML 根項目類別的預設命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Calling this overload is similar to calling the [XmlSerializer(Type, XmlAttributeOverrides, Type\[\], XmlRootAttribute, String)](assetId:///M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor(System.Type,System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides,System.Type[],System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute,System.String)?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False) to create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個多載是類似於呼叫[XmlSerializer (型別，XmlAttributeOverrides，型別\[\]，XmlRootAttribute，String)](assetId:///M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor(System.Type,System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides,System.Type[],System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute,System.String)?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False)來建立執行個體的<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>類別。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>序列化。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> that contains fields that override the default serialization behavior.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>，其中包含覆寫預設序列化行為的欄位。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> array of additional object types to serialize.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>要序列化的其他物件類型的陣列。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> that represents the XML root element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute>代表 XML 根項目。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The default namespace of all XML elements in the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 預設命名空間的 XML 文件中的所有 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: A derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>所衍生

trans-unit.source: Returns a derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class that can serialize objects of the specified type into XML document instances, and vice versa.

trans-unit.target: 每個要序列化的物件本身可包含類別，這個多載可以覆寫與其他類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This overload also specifies the default namespace for all the XML elements, and the class to use as the XML root element.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載也會指定所有的 XML 項目，以及要做為 XML 根項目類別的預設命名空間。

trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>要序列化的其他物件類型的陣列。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute>，定義 XML 根項目屬性。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The default namespace of all XML elements in the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 預設命名空間的 XML 文件中的所有 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: Calling this overload is similar to calling the [XmlSerializer(Type, XmlAttributeOverrides, Type\[\], XmlRootAttribute, String, String, Evidence)](assetId:///M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor(System.Type,System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides,System.Type[],System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute,System.String,System.String,System.Security.Policy.Evidence)?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False) to create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class.
